wikipedia_page.main:
Derek Thomas Tulk (born 21 April 1934 at Southampton, Hampshire) was an English first-class cricketer. Tulk was a right-handed batsman who bowled right-arm medium pace.
Tulk represented Hampshire in two first-class matches, the first of which came in 1956 against Gloucestershire. Tulk's second and final first-class match came in 1957 against Cambridge University.

response: *Derek Tulk, cricketer, was born in Southampton
